comments:
Build 2.1 RC1

I was accessing our ZRH CVS repository:
:extssh:dmegert@ottcvs1.ott.oti.com:/home/cvs/zrheclipse
(don't know if you can access it. You might ask infra for anonymous
read-only access)

I can now work again after bug 30985 was fixed but I still get an error when I
try to access one of the projects which seem to be twice under HEAD (no idea how
it came there - I didn't create it).

Jen's org.eclipse.jdt.ui both show up as Jen). Our parsing didn't anticipate 
this.
